channel.title: D Claws On DeltaScape
channel.description:
How can i add d claws to a deltascape source, idc if there white claws or steel, aslong as they have a special att and hit 4 times and sorta have the emote :S
can i get a guide please?

item.title: D Claws On DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Take a look at this guide for the special attacks: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,343373.0.html It’s not set up for Deltascape, but it wouldn’t be that hard to convert it.

Also, Dragon Claws are client side and server side. You either need to get a server + client that already has it, or learn how to make models and put them into clients, then declare their bonus’s ect. in your server.

Read full topic

item.title: D Claws On DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

I would like to know that as well how to add the 4 hit spec on delta. Hopefully someone can help.
